greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Infinite sequence of positive integers such that a(n) = A037445(a(1)+a(2)+...+a(n)) for all n>=1.
comment: The first infinitary analog (see also A260123) of A259935 (see comment there). Using Falcao's method (2015) one can prove that such an infinite sequence exists.
results.author: _Vladimir Shevelev_, Jul 15 2015
